resources.string: Subscribe to Keep Up with Our Future Events
We\'d Like to Hear from You!
Do you have any suggestions for the NUSH 15th Anniversary App? Let us know below!
How was your experience with us?

All staffs and students currently studying in NUS High will be taking a group photo by arranging themselves to form the official logo of the school. This will be a one and only chance for the whole school to take a group photo for the first time.
Alumni of NUS High will be welcomed back to the school to have a look and celebrate the school\'s 15th anniversary with each other.

Visitors are invited to join our open house to learn more about life in NUS High. Students will be showcasing their achievements and research projects. CCA groups will also be introducing their CCA to the visitors
The school will be launching its own home made nano satellite into space in commemoration of the 15th anniversary under the CubeSat project. This project will be carried out by our students.
